snippet.title: It's Never Too Late to Try Something New
snippet.description: * It's Never Too Late to Try Something New Running has been part of my life since middle school. snippet.title: Arch Support Is Not From Shoes
snippet.description: * Arch Support Is Not From Shoes Engineered running shoes are not necessary to prevent lower leg pain. Some even add to knee and ankle pain - more in other articles. Support your own feet by holding position using your own muscles, not a shoe 'straight jacket' that lets ankles atrophy...

snippet.title: Are You a Cross Country Runner at Heart?
snippet.description: * Are You a Cross Country Runner at Heart? Like track, cross country involves running over a predetermined course. Unlike track, however, it's much more than simply running from point A to point B. Cross country can take you over dirt trails, grassy fields, steep hills, rocky areas, and muddy...
